#summary Example HotwirePipe commands

= Sample !HotwirePipe commands =

{{{
walk /home/me/Media | py-filter 'it.size > 10**7'
}}}

Find all files in Media bigger than 10 megabytes.

{{{
svn diff
|filter -i frob
}}}

Generate a diff, then find all lines matching "frob" in it.

{{{
proc | filter frob cmd | kill
}}}

Kill all processes (owned by you) with `frob` in their name.

{{{
ls *.zip | apply rm
}}}

Move all zip files in the current directory to the trash.
